wikipedia_page.main: Samuel Northmore (2 March 1872 – 18 March 1946) was an English rugby union footballer who played in the 1890s. He played at representative level for England, and at club level for Millom, as a fly-half.

response: * Samuel Northmore won a cap for England (RU) while at Millom in 1897 against Ireland
